name: Quantum Golf
description:
Ricochet your way through a field of particles and find the flag pole as fast as you can!

To control the ball, press and hold X, and use the arrow keys to aim. Then, when you've got the angle you want, release the X button and see where it goes! 

There are two ways of keeping score: the timer and the number of times you launch the ball. Try to get both as low as possible.
